features: GENTLE INTIMATE CLEANSING: Sensitive skin approved! Our clean yoni, plant-based feminine wash is designed to gently cleanse the intimate area without causing irritation and discomfort. This gentle formula is intended to maintain the natural pH balance and reduce the risk of infections.

NATURAL INGREDIENTS: Plant-based ingredients to help maintain delicate intimate health. Aloe Vera for mazimum hydration and skin soothing, Apple Cider Vinegar for pH balancing, Chamomile for skin healing and Probioics to keep the intimate area balanced and infections at a minimum.
MADE WITHOUT: Sulfates, Parabens, Phthalates - kick your old soap to the curb with these intimate area friendly ingredients.
HYDRATING AND MOISTURIZING: Only the best for your delicate intimate area.. This high quality foaming wash includes herbs oils and flowers to cleanse, hydrate and refresh.
ODOR NEUTRALIZING: Key pH balancing ingredients to help eleviate odor and sweat. Plant-based probiotics, to help balance and refresh.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Her Secret Garden is a woman-owned plant-based feminine hygiene brand. Based in the USA, we are all about empowerment, self-care, self-love, and creating safe spaces for women to be and grow. Her Secret Garden was started out of a need to help women heal on a more spiritual level. We utilize herbs and all-natural oils and ingredients to help women stay balanced, moisturized, and renewed during their most intimate time of self-care. Our products were created to awaken feminine energy and bring you back to self-love and self-awareness. We are dedicated to uplifting all our sisters all around the world!

Happy Yoni plant-based feminine oil is a natural and gentle oil blend designed specifically for the delicate area of the female body. This unique formula is made 100% pure and plant-based ingredients that work to nourish, soothe and protect the intimate area. The ingredients in this oil include a blend of nourishing and moisturizing oils such as coconut oil, grapeseed oil and neem oil as well as natural extracts from herbs like lemongrass, tea tree and red raspberry leaf. The gentle formula of Happy Yoni oil is perfect for daily use. Simply apply a small amount to the external genital area after showering or bathing, or as needed for comfort and hydration. The oil is light and non-greasy and absorbs quickly into the skin for a comfortable and silky-smooth feel. We use only the purest plant-based ingredients, including aloe vera, apple cider vinegar, chamomile, and probiotics which soothe and nourish the skin. Our yoni wash is free from harsh chemicals making it safe and gentle for daily use. Experience the benefits of a natural, hydrating feminine wash that promotes your intimate health and hygiene. Our yoni wash is the perfect addition to your daily self-care routine, leaving you feeling fresh, clean, and confident all day. Our plant-based feminine Balancing spray is gentle and helps to maintain a healthy balance. Made with natural ingredients including aloe vera, probiotics, silver, and b12, this spray is a safe and effective way to keep your intimate area fresh and clean. Our spray is formulated to help restore and maintain the natural balance of your intimate area, which can be disrupted by various factors. Our probiotic-infused formula is gentle enough for daily use and free from harsh chemicals, dyes, parabens, and fragrances. Instead, we use natural ingredients like herbs, essential oils, and colloidal silver. Our Love Spray Body Oil 2 ounce is infused with a bend of essential oils known for their aphrodisiac properties, including Ylang-Ylang, Geranium, and Pomegranate. This body oil is formulated with a luxurious blend of oils to deeply moisturize and nourish your skin. The Love Spray Body Oil not only hydrates but also promotes a sense of relaxation and intimacy. Simply spritz the Love Spray onto your body or environment to create a romantic and sensual atmosphere. Use it as a mood enhancer during intimate moments with your partner, or as a way to pamper and indulge yourself. Apply the body oil after a shower or bath to lock in moisture and leave your skin feeling silky and smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a gentle foaming cleanser with a nice floral scent. I generally try to avoid scents to prevent irritation but had no issues with this wash. This foam has a good lather and I feel refreshed after.Overall I really like it and would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't have a scent
reviews.reviewText: I guess it works. Not to sure, but it does not have a scent. I do feel clean, but then again, I would feel clean using regular soap too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so nice!
reviews.reviewText: I love that this was is foaming and has such a nice light scent. I will say I avoid using it before intimate time because it is perfumed and opt for an unscented wash for those times.It’s gentle and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love a Foam Feminine Wash!
reviews.reviewText: I prefer a foam feminine wash because they are lightweight & easier to spread around. This is a really nice foam. It creates a rich, subtly scented lather that spreads well, leaving your body feeling clean & fresh. The entire presentation of this product is well done & I feel comfortable using it. I have experience no irritation or negative side effects from this item.

reviews.reviewerName: Teeya GOT A VIEW 👀Teeya GOT A VIEW 👀
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Washes and Cleanses Well
reviews.reviewText: I was a little apprehensive about using this Feminine Hygiene Wash at first.Due to me having Sensitive Skin especially in my personal areas.So far I have had No Issues with Irritation or anything.This Foam lathers Very Well and it leaves my most intimate places feeling Nice and Clean. ( I LOVE HOW CLEANSING IT IS 💕💕💕 )The Only thing that I am not fond of is that it’s not really scented. To me it has more of a light medicine smell.Overall I do LOVE 💕 the results I get from using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This has a really good foam and feels soft, and clean. It doesn't really have a scent. It dispenses very easily. Worked well. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice flower smell.
reviews.reviewText: Soft soap in foam. Very gentle soap that smells very nice and clean good.
